prayer.title: 🕊️ Morning Prayer
prayer.modeh_ani: מודה אני לפניך — I gratefully thank You, living and eternal King, for returning my soul within me with compassion.
prayer.blessing: Blessed are You who releases the bound — free me from what holds me back.
prayer.psalm: Psalm 32:8: "I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go."
prayer.proverb: Proverbs 27:23: "Know well the condition of your flocks, and give attention to your herds."
prayer.intention: Let me build not just for profit, but for purpose — something that matters.
prayer.closing: Go in peace. Build with purpose. Return with gratitude.

mre.title: 📊 MRE Trading
mre.thesis: F&G neutral at 46, global regime bull but late-cycle. Commodities (GDX, GLD, XLB) leading rotation — classic defensive shift. No active BUY signals; all 24 assets on HOLD. Tighten stops, consider gold exposure.
pulse_actions: ✅ Stay invested in broad market — SPY in uptrend but be selective
⚠️ Tighten stop-losses — late bull cycle means higher volatility ahead
🟡 Consider adding gold exposure — GLD/GDX leading rotation
🛡️ Consider bond allocation — late cycle is time to build defensive positions

family.title: ❤️ Family Focus
recommendations: PRIORITY: Focus on repair. Acknowledge recent conflicts without defending.
Increase acts of service dramatically this week.
Create space for her to express frustrations without fixing.
family.note: Relationship compass flagging critical. Lean in hard today — Jillian needs to feel heard, not fixed.

items.headline: Israel eliminates Hamas operative behind deadly 2004 Beersheba bus bombings — long-sought target taken out in precision strike.
Netanyahu departs for diplomatic meetings as West Bank development plans draw international commentary. Administration clarifies position on sovereignty steps.
October 7 commemoration bill moves through Knesset — debate over official naming convention continues among bereaved families and lawmakers.
President Herzog visits Australia — first Israeli presidential visit, strengthening bilateral ties in Canberra.

Trump administration set to revoke Obama-era EPA 'endangerment finding' on CO2 this week — removes legal foundation for federal emissions regulations, returning energy policy to market-driven approach.
Top immigration officials defend enforcement priorities in congressional hearing — border crossings remain at multi-year lows as deportation operations continue.
Google expands 'Results About You' tool to cover government IDs — users can now request removal of driver's licenses, passports, and SSNs from search results.
US forces in Qatar load missile launchers amid Iran tensions — satellite imagery shows military readiness posture in the Gulf.
Alphabet raises $20B in bonds to fund AI data center buildout — plans to double capex to $185B in 2026, signaling massive infrastructure commitment.
OpenAI updates privacy policy — review notification received. Worth scanning for any data handling changes that affect your workflows.
Sarvam AI launches India-first AI platform positioning against Gemini and ChatGPT — focused on local language APIs for the Indian market.
AI data privacy emerging as C-suite priority — new analysis warns that deletion and control are harder than expected in production AI systems.
